list.title: File I/O Problems
list.bullet: Disk access is slower than memory access (duh!)
Simultaeneous write/write operations cause data corruption. Therefore locking must occur.

list.title: File I/O Tips
list.bullet:
Use the disk in concentrated bits, meaning do all
your writing together.
Do Not Read Large Files Into Memory!
Do Not Read Small Files From Disk!

Employ caching to access frequently used data
stored in memory

Try and put write operations where they will
cause the least loss in user experience (remember,
web pages are chunked!)
